revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=CradlePoint |model=IBR600E |revision=(Verizon) |upc=661799365543 |asin=B0074LVTNK |fcc_date=08/10/2011 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=U-MEDIA |manuf_model=MPB-377L |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router, 3G mobile router, |fcc_id=UXX-IBR600E, N7N-MC5728, |ic_id=2417C-MC5728 |pcb_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3352 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6JB25I |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe (USB only) |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3352 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module=Sierra Wireless AirPrime MC5728V |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe (USB only) |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols=CDMA |wi2_ant_conn= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=3G (CDMA) |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=IBR600-XXX |default_ssid_regex=^IBR600-[a-f0-9]{3}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:30:44 |oui_eth=00:30:44 }} {{TagLine|3G Mobile Router}} :[http://www.cradlepoint.com/products/machine-to-machine-routers/cor-ibr600-3G-4G-router Product page] {{•}} [http://www.cradlepoint.com/sites/default/files/productdocs/CradlePoint_COR_IBR6x0_DataSheet_6.14.12.pdf Datasheet] {{•}} [http://www.cradlepoint.com/sites/default/files/productdocs/COR_IBR6x0_manual_3.6.1.pdf Manual]
Per the manual, the default SSID pattern is '''IBR600-XXX'''. :WiGLE data indicates that the SSID is the last three hex :digits of the wireless interface MAC (lower case letters). The default password appears to be the last 8 digits :of the wireless interface MAC address.
==Images== <gallery caption="from CradlePoint"> File:IBR600E 1.jpg|angled, front File:COR IBR600LE SIM View sm.png|back </gallery>[[Has images::external| ]]
